message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a limited time. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $108. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really like the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $107. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great value for the product!
